5 Recipe Ideas

Pinakbet

Pinakbet is a Filipino vegetable stew made with a variety of vegetables and flavored with bagoong (fermented fish sauce) and other seasonings.

Pork Sisig

Pork sisig is a popular Filipino dish made with chopped pig's face and ears, seasoned with soy sauce, vinegar, and various spices, then served on a sizzling plate.

Beef Pares

Beef pares is a Filipino dish made with braised beef brisket, cooked in a savory-sweet soy sauce-based broth, and served with garlic fried rice.

Pancit Guisado

Pancit guisado is a Filipino stir-fried noodle dish made with bihon (thin rice noodles) or canton (thick egg noodles), mixed with vegetables, meat, and often seafood, seasoned with soy sauce and other spices.

Adobong Manok

Adobong manok is a classic Filipino dish made with chicken marinated and simmered in a mixture of vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and other seasonings, resulting in a tangy and savory flavor.
